attributes.action: Government to have a COVID testing centre at immingham lorry park
attributes.background:
Uk hauliers need to get a COVID test going from uk to Europe 

Coming from Europe to Uk no test needed

Immingham and killingholme are one of the busiest ports in the uk 
And the nearest test centre is 50 miles away from immingham

rejection.details:
Decisions about where to locate Covid-19 test centres is a matter for the NHS, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to ensure that Covid-19 testing is available at all ports, for hauliers, if that's what you want to happen.
